lines: Music is a world within itself

For all to sing
dance and clap their hands

a record has a groove

A When the people start to move

just won't quit
But here are some of
music's pioneers
That time will not
allows us to forget
For there's Basie Miller
Sachimo And the king
of all Sir Duke
And with a voice like
Ella's ringing out
There's no way the band can lose
